scripts.e2e:ios: echo "Error: no iOS E2E test specified" && exit 0
scripts.e2e:android: echo "Error: no android E2E test specified" && exit 0
scripts.postversion: git add package.json package-lock.json && git commit -m "JS Release $npm_new_version" && git tag -a rel/js/$npm_new_version -m "JS Release: $npm_new_version" && git push && git push --tags
